text.more:
Originally this graph showed the relation between people and their relations to institutions,
on the level of work, education and associations
This graph is a projection mapping of a two node graph between people and institutions.
Here we only see the direct relations between people with help of the plugin MultiMode Network.

The nodes show people, places (mostly cities) and countries. 
These node types are grouped by color. The color represents 'Modularity class', which might indicate social cohesion.
Why these groups belong together has to be studied further.

The edges show the relations between people (instead of between institutions and people).
The thickness of the line represents that people have more than one institutional connection.
text.intro:
This is a visualisation of the network of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata.
It represents people who have an overlap in (multiple) institutions related to work, education and associations.
It also shows job functions. More info in long description.
text.title: Social cohesion of the network of the correspondents of Guido Gezelle on Wikidata
